label: I-26 Photo 0784
description: Mount Pisgah Baptist Church on site affected by the construction of Interstate 26 (I-26). Address: northwest corner of C and E Street. Sign for Washington Grocery in foreground at right (appears to be across the street).  Surveyor notations on back of photo:  "Dkt.: 10.517.  Property owner: Mt. Pisgah Baptist Church.  Tract: 21.  Station: 5946+40 CL - Line 6.  Date: February 21, 1963.  In R/W - Bought."  [See collection description for explanation of surveyor notations.]
